name: No Rise Yummy Cinnamon Rolls
ingredients: 2 ½ cups flour 2 Tb white sugar
1 ¼ tsp baking powder ½ tsp baking soda
1/3 tsp salt 1 Tb melted butter (add last when above ingredients
steps: ½ tsp salt 1 ¼ cups buttermilk
Mix dry ingredients. Mix butter and milk, and add to dry ingredients. On a floured surface, knead until smooth.
Roll out the dough into a large rectangle. Brush with melted butter and add the filling. You may want to press the
filling into the dough. Roll and cut into 8 pieces. Brush tops with melted butter.
Bake at 425 for 23-­‐25 minutes. When cooled add icing.
¾ cups brown sugar ¼ cup sugar
